  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_108191</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_108191</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Villi and microvilli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darmzotten und Microvilli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Villus et microvilli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Villi e microvilli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Villi e microvilli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Villi και μικρολάχνες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Villi y microvellosidades</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the structure of villi and microvilli found on the lining of the small intestine. This can be used to determine what is the part of the villi labelled X called.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">digestive system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microvilli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">organs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">small intestines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">villi</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Struktur der 
Darmzotten und der Microvilli, die auf dem Futter des kleinen Darmes 
gefunden werden. Dieses kann verwendet werden, um festzustellen,
was das Teil der Darmzotten ist, die benanntes X beschriftet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre la structure des villus et 
des microvilli trouvés sur la doublure du petit intestin. Ceci 
peut être employé pour déterminer ce qui est la pièce des villus 
étiquetés X appelé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a estrutura dos villi e dos
microvilli encontrados no forro do intestine pequeno. Isto pode 
ser usado determinar o que é a peça dos villi etiquetados X chamado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra la struttura dei villi e 
dei microvilli trovati sul rivestimento di piccolo intestino. 
Ciò può essere usata per determinare che cosa è la parte dei 
villi identificati X chiamata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τη δομή villi και των 
μικρολαχνών που βρίσκονται στην επένδυση του λεπτού εντέρου. 
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να καθορίσει ποιο είναι 
το μέρος villi επονομαζόμενα το Χ αποκαλούμενο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra la estructura de los villi 
y de las microvellosidades encontrados en la guarnición del intestino
pequeño. Esto se puede utilizar para determinarse cuál es la 
pieza de los villi etiquetados X llamado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdauungssystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Microvilli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Organe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kleine Därme</string>
          </keyword>
